attributes.action: Refuse Piers Morgan re-entry to the United Kingdom if deported from the US
attributes.additional_details:
A growing movement in the United States is calling for Piers Morgan to be deported after airing his views on gun control on his television programme.

If Piers Morgan is deported from the United States we ask the Home Secretary to deny Piers re-entry to the United Kingdom and rescind his British citizenship.
